title: "2 teams of Berkeley researchers teach robot to walk on its own in record time"
excerpt: "Two teams of UC Berkeley researchers have trained quadruped robots, also known as robot dogs, to learn to walk on their own in the real world in record time using reinforcement learning, or RL, algorithms."
